companyDescription: Maxis strives to enable individuals, families, businesses and communities to stay ahead by connecting lives via our seamless connectivity, contributing in building the future. Our Mobile, Fibre and Enterprise offerings are tailored to suit their unique lifestyle and workplace needs.
